title: IELTS Sentence Builder - Interactive Exercises
description: Practice transforming sentences using various grammatical structures

structureFamilies.familyNameVi: Cấu trúc cơ bản S + V + O

structures.name: S + V + O
structures.example: The government invests in education.
structures.exampleVi: Chính phủ đầu tư vào giáo dục.

structures.name: S + V + adv + O
structures.example: The government invests significantly in education.
structures.exampleVi: Chính phủ đầu tư đáng kể vào giáo dục.

structureFamilies.description: Focus on the receiver of the action

structures.name: O + be + V3 + (by S)
structures.example: Education is prioritized by the government.
structures.exampleVi: Giáo dục được chính phủ ưu tiên.

structures.name: O + modal + be + V3
structures.example: Education should be prioritized.
structures.exampleVi: Giáo dục nên được ưu tiên.

structures.name: It + be + V3 + that
structures.formula: It + be + Past Participle + that + clause
structures.example: It is believed that education is essential.
structures.exampleVi: Người ta tin rằng giáo dục là thiết yếu.

structureFamilies.description: Add information using who, which, that, where, when

structures.name: S + V + O, which + V
structures.example: Technology improves efficiency, which benefits companies.
structures.exampleVi: Công nghệ cải thiện hiệu suất, điều này có lợi cho các công ty.

structures.name: N + who + V
structures.formula: Noun + who + verb (defining relative clause for people)
structures.example: Students who study hard achieve better results.
structures.exampleVi: Học sinh chăm chỉ đạt kết quả tốt hơn.

structures.name: N + that + S + V
structures.formula: Noun + that + subject + verb (defining relative clause)
structures.example: The skills that employers require include communication and teamwork.
structures.exampleVi: Các kỹ năng mà nhà tuyển dụng yêu cầu bao gồm giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm.

structures.name: N + where + S + V
structures.example: Schools where technology is used produce better results.
structures.exampleVi: Trường học sử dụng công nghệ đạt kết quả tốt hơn.

structures.name: N + V-ing
structures.example: Students studying abroad gain valuable experience.
structures.exampleVi: Sinh viên du học có được kinh nghiệm quý báu.

structureFamilies.description: What/That/Whether clauses as subject or object

structures.name: What + S + V + is + N
structures.example: What students need is practical training.
structures.exampleVi: Điều học sinh cần là đào tạo thực tế.

structures.name: It + be + adj + that
structures.example: It is essential that students practice daily.
structures.exampleVi: Điều cần thiết là học sinh luyện tập hàng ngày.

structures.name: The fact that + clause
structures.example: The fact that pollution is increasing is alarming.
structures.exampleVi: Việc ô nhiễm đang tăng lên là đáng báo động.

structures.name: The reason why + clause
structures.formula: The reason why + clause + is + explanation
structures.example: The reason why students fail is poor preparation.
structures.exampleVi: Lý do học sinh thất bại là chuẩn bị kém.

structureFamilies.description: Because, although, if, when, while clauses

structures.name: Because + clause, S + V
structures.example: Because technology advances, jobs change.
structures.exampleVi: Vì công nghệ phát triển, công việc thay đổi.

structures.name: Although + clause, S + V
structures.example: Although costs are high, benefits are greater.
structures.exampleVi: Mặc dù chi phí cao, lợi ích lớn hơn.

structures.name: If + clause, S + V
structures.example: If governments invest more, education improves.
structures.exampleVi: Nếu chính phủ đầu tư nhiều hơn, giáo dục cải thiện.

structures.name: While + clause, S + V
structures.example: While some disagree, most support this policy.
structures.exampleVi: Trong khi một số người phản đối, đa số ủng hộ chính sách này.

structures.name: There is/are + N
structures.example: There are many benefits to education.
structures.exampleVi: Có nhiều lợi ích của giáo dục.

structures.name: There is + N + that + V
structures.formula: There + is + Noun + that + relative clause
structures.example: There is evidence that supports this claim.
structures.exampleVi: Có bằng chứng ủng hộ nhận định này.

structures.name: There has been + N
structures.example: There has been an increase in online learning.
structures.exampleVi: Đã có sự gia tăng học trực tuyến.

structureFamilies.description: Emphasize specific parts using It is...that

structures.name: It is + N + that + V
structures.example: It is the government that should invest.
structures.exampleVi: Chính là chính phủ nên đầu tư.

structures.name: It is + N + who + V
structures.example: It is students who benefit most.
structures.exampleVi: Chính là học sinh hưởng lợi nhiều nhất.

structures.name: What + S + V + is + N
structures.example: What we need is better resources.
structures.exampleVi: Điều chúng ta cần là nguồn lực tốt hơn.

structures.name: The + N + of + N
structures.example: The improvement of education requires funding.
structures.exampleVi: Việc cải thiện giáo dục cần kinh phí.

structures.name: V-ing + O + V
structures.example: Investing in education helps the economy.
structures.exampleVi: Đầu tư vào giáo dục giúp nền kinh tế.

structures.name: N + N + V
structures.example: Government investment leads to economic and social progress.
structures.exampleVi: Đầu tư của chính phủ dẫn đến tiến bộ kinh tế và xã hội.

structureFamilies.description: Show relationships between causes and effects

structures.name: N + lead to + N
structures.example: Pollution leads to health problems.
structures.exampleVi: Ô nhiễm dẫn đến vấn đề sức khỏe.

structures.name: N + result in + N
structures.example: Poor diet results in obesity.
structures.exampleVi: Chế độ ăn kém dẫn đến béo phì.

structures.name: N + is caused by + N
structures.example: Obesity is caused by poor diet.
structures.exampleVi: Béo phì là do chế độ ăn kém gây ra.

structures.name: Due to + N, clause
structures.example: Due to pollution, there is an increase in health problems.
structures.exampleVi: Do ô nhiễm, có sự gia tăng các vấn đề sức khỏe.

structureFamilies.description: Show how something makes another possible

structures.name: N + allow + O + to V
structures.example: Technology allows people to work remotely.
structures.exampleVi: Công nghệ cho phép mọi người làm việc từ xa.

structures.name: N + enable + O + to V
structures.example: Education enables students to succeed.
structures.exampleVi: Giáo dục giúp học sinh thành công.

structures.name: N + help + O + (to) V
structures.example: Exercise helps people stay healthy.
structures.exampleVi: Tập thể dục giúp mọi người khỏe mạnh.

structures.name: N + make it possible for + O + to V
structures.formula: Subject + make it possible for + Object + to + Verb
structures.example: Grants make it possible for students to study.
structures.exampleVi: Học bổng giúp sinh viên có thể học.

structureFamilies.description: Use V-ing or V3 phrases to add information

structures.name: By V-ing, S + V
structures.example: By studying hard, students succeed.
structures.exampleVi: Bằng cách học chăm chỉ, học sinh thành công.

structures.name: V-ing, S + V
structures.example: Working from home, employees save time.
structures.exampleVi: Làm việc tại nhà, nhân viên tiết kiệm thời gian.

structures.name: V3, S + V
structures.example: Faced with challenges, they adapted.
structures.exampleVi: Đối mặt với thách thức, họ thích nghi.

structureFamilies.description: Compare using more, most, as...as, rather than

structures.name: S + V + more + adj + than
structures.formula: Subject + Verb + more + Adjective + than + Object
structures.example: Online learning is more flexible than traditional classroom learning.
structures.exampleVi: Học trực tuyến linh hoạt hơn học truyền thống trong lớp.

structures.name: S + V + the most + adj
structures.example: This is the most effective method.
structures.exampleVi: Đây là phương pháp hiệu quả nhất.

structures.name: The more..., the more...
structures.formula: The more + clause, the more + clause
structures.example: The more you practice, the better you become.
structures.exampleVi: Càng luyện tập nhiều, bạn càng giỏi hơn.

structures.name: S + V + rather than + V
structures.example: Students should practice rather than memorize.
structures.exampleVi: Học sinh nên thực hành thay vì học thuộc.

wordArrange.answer: The government should invest in education.
acceptedAnswers: The government should invest in education.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Chính phủ nên đầu tư vào giáo dục.

wordArrange.answer: Students who study hard achieve better results.
acceptedAnswers: Students who study hard achieve better results.
wordArrange.hint: Use 'who' to connect the subject with the relative clause
wordArrange.vietnamese: Học sinh chăm chỉ đạt kết quả tốt hơn.

wordArrange.answer: It is essential that students practice daily.
acceptedAnswers: It is essential that students practice daily.
wordArrange.hint: Use 'It is + adjective + that + clause' structure
wordArrange.vietnamese: Điều cần thiết là học sinh luyện tập hàng ngày.

wordArrange.answer: The improvement of education requires funding.
acceptedAnswers: The improvement of education requires funding.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Việc cải thiện giáo dục cần kinh phí.

wordArrange.answer: Investing in education helps the economy.
acceptedAnswers: Investing in education helps the economy.
wordArrange.hint: Start with the gerund (V-ing) as subject
wordArrange.vietnamese: Đầu tư vào giáo dục giúp nền kinh tế.

wordArrange.answer: Technology is changing the way we work.
acceptedAnswers: Technology is changing the way we work.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Công nghệ đang thay đổi cách chúng ta làm việc.

wordArrange.answer: Technology allows people to work remotely.
acceptedAnswers: Technology allows people to work remotely.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép mọi người làm việc từ xa.

wordArrange.answer: Using technology leads to greater efficiency.
acceptedAnswers: Using technology leads to greater efficiency.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Sử dụng công nghệ dẫn đến hiệu quả cao hơn.

acceptedAnswers: Pollution leads to health problems.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Ô nhiễm dẫn đến vấn đề sức khỏe.

wordArrange.answer: By recycling, we can reduce waste.
acceptedAnswers: By recycling, we can reduce waste.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Bằng cách tái chế, chúng ta có thể giảm rác thải.

wordArrange.answer: There is evidence that temperatures are rising.
acceptedAnswers: There is evidence that temperatures are rising.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Có bằng chứng cho thấy nhiệt độ đang tăng.

acceptedAnswers: Exercising regularly helps improve health.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Tập thể dục thường xuyên giúp cải thiện sức khỏe.

wordArrange.answer: It is believed that exercise reduces stress.
acceptedAnswers: It is believed that exercise reduces stress.
wordArrange.hint: Use 'It is + V3 + that' passive structure
wordArrange.vietnamese: Người ta tin rằng tập thể dục giảm căng thẳng.

wordArrange.answer: Technology enables employees to work from home.
acceptedAnswers: Technology enables employees to work from home.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép nhân viên làm việc tại nhà.

wordArrange.answer: The more you practice, the better you become.
acceptedAnswers: The more you practice, the better you become.
wordArrange.vietnamese: Càng luyện tập nhiều, bạn càng giỏi hơn.

fillOneWord.sentence: The government _____ invest more in education.
acceptedAnswers: should
must
will
could
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Chính phủ nên đầu tư nhiều hơn vào giáo dục.

fillOneWord.sentence: Students _____ study hard achieve better results.
acceptedAnswers: who
that
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Học sinh chăm chỉ đạt kết quả tốt hơn.

fillOneWord.sentence: It is essential _____ students practice regularly.
acceptedAnswers: that
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Điều cần thiết là học sinh luyện tập thường xuyên.

fillOneWord.sentence: _____ students need is practical training.
acceptedAnswers: What
fillOneWord.hint: Start a noun clause as subject
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Điều học sinh cần là đào tạo thực tế.

fillOneWord.sentence: The improvement _____ education requires more funding.
acceptedAnswers: in
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Việc cải thiện giáo dục cần nhiều kinh phí hơn.

fillOneWord.sentence: Technology allows people _____ work remotely.
acceptedAnswers: to
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép mọi người làm việc từ xa.

fillOneWord.sentence: Technology, _____ is constantly evolving, affects our daily lives.
acceptedAnswers: which
fillOneWord.hint: Non-defining relative pronoun for things (with comma)
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Công nghệ, mà liên tục phát triển, ảnh hưởng đến cuộc sống hàng ngày của chúng ta.

fillOneWord.sentence: Using technology _____ to greater efficiency.
acceptedAnswers: leads
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Sử dụng công nghệ dẫn đến hiệu quả cao hơn.

fillOneWord.sentence: It is _____ that technology has changed our lives.
acceptedAnswers: clear
obvious
evident
true
undeniable
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Rõ ràng là công nghệ đã thay đổi cuộc sống của chúng ta.

fillOneWord.sentence: Pollution _____ to health problems.
acceptedAnswers: leads
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Ô nhiễm dẫn đến các vấn đề sức khỏe.

fillOneWord.sentence: _____ recycling regularly, we can reduce waste.
acceptedAnswers: By
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Bằng cách tái chế thường xuyên, chúng ta có thể giảm rác thải.

fillOneWord.sentence: There _____ evidence that climate change is real.
acceptedAnswers: is
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Có bằng chứng cho thấy biến đổi khí hậu là có thật.

fillOneWord.sentence: _____ to pollution, many species are endangered.
acceptedAnswers: Due
Owing
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Do ô nhiễm, nhiều loài đang bị đe dọa.

fillOneWord.sentence: Exercising regularly _____ improve health.
acceptedAnswers: helps
can
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Tập thể dục thường xuyên giúp cải thiện sức khỏe.

fillOneWord.sentence: It is _____ that exercise reduces stress.
acceptedAnswers: believed
known
proven
shown
fillOneWord.hint: Past participle of a reporting verb
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Người ta tin rằng tập thể dục giảm căng thẳng.

fillOneWord.sentence: Poor diet results _____ various health problems.
acceptedAnswers: in
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Chế độ ăn kém dẫn đến nhiều vấn đề sức khỏe.

fillOneWord.sentence: Technology _____ employees to work from home.
acceptedAnswers: enables
allows
permits
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép nhân viên làm việc tại nhà.

fillOneWord.sentence: The more you practice, _____ better you become.
acceptedAnswers: the
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Càng luyện tập nhiều, bạn càng giỏi hơn.

fillOneWord.sentence: Employees _____ work hard are often promoted.
acceptedAnswers: who
that
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Nhân viên làm việc chăm chỉ thường được thăng chức.

fillOneWord.sentence: _____ is important is teamwork and communication.
acceptedAnswers: What
fillOneWord.hint: Start a noun clause emphasizing something
fillOneWord.vietnamese: Điều quan trọng là làm việc nhóm và giao tiếp.

sentenceTransform.original: The government funds public schools.
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại bằng câu bị động
sentenceTransform.answer: Public schools are funded by the government.
acceptedAnswers: Public schools are funded by the government.
Public schools are funded by the government
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Trường công được chính phủ tài trợ.

sentenceTransform.original: Students study hard. They achieve better results.
sentenceTransform.answer: Students who study hard achieve better results.
acceptedAnswers: Students who study hard achieve better results.
Students who study hard achieve better results
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Học sinh chăm chỉ đạt kết quả tốt hơn.

sentenceTransform.original: Students need practical training.
sentenceTransform.answer: What students need is practical training.
acceptedAnswers: What students need is practical training.
What students need is practical training
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Điều học sinh cần là đào tạo thực tế.

sentenceTransform.original: Investing in education helps the economy.
sentenceTransform.answer: Investment in education leads to economic benefits.
acceptedAnswers: Investment in education leads to economic benefits.
Investment in education leads to economic growth.
Investment in education leads to a better economy.
Investing in education leads to economic benefits.
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Đầu tư vào giáo dục dẫn đến lợi ích kinh tế.

sentenceTransform.original: The government should invest in education.
sentenceTransform.instruction: Rewrite to emphasize 'the government' using 'It is...that'
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại để nhấn mạnh 'the government' dùng 'It is...that'
sentenceTransform.answer: It is the government that should invest in education.
acceptedAnswers: It is the government that should invest in education.
It is the government that should invest in education
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Chính là chính phủ nên đầu tư vào giáo dục.

sentenceTransform.original: Social media connects people worldwide.
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại dùng V-ing làm chủ ngữ
sentenceTransform.answer: Using social media connects people worldwide.
acceptedAnswers: Using social media connects people worldwide.
Using social media connects people worldwide
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Sử dụng mạng xã hội kết nối mọi người trên toàn thế giới.

sentenceTransform.original: Technology helps people work remotely.
sentenceTransform.answer: Technology allows people to work remotely.
acceptedAnswers: Technology allows people to work remotely.
Technology allows people to work remotely
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép mọi người làm việc từ xa.

sentenceTransform.original: Technology improves efficiency. This benefits companies.
sentenceTransform.answer: Technology improves efficiency, which benefits companies.
acceptedAnswers: Technology improves efficiency, which benefits companies.
Technology improves efficiency, which benefits companies
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Công nghệ cải thiện hiệu suất, điều này có lợi cho các công ty.

sentenceTransform.original: People believe technology has changed our lives.
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại dùng 'It is believed that...'
sentenceTransform.answer: It is believed that technology has changed our lives.
acceptedAnswers: It is believed that technology has changed our lives.
It is believed that technology has changed our lives
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Người ta tin rằng công nghệ đã thay đổi cuộc sống của chúng ta.

sentenceTransform.original: Pollution causes health problems.
sentenceTransform.answer: Pollution leads to health problems.
acceptedAnswers: Pollution leads to health problems.
Pollution leads to health problems
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Ô nhiễm dẫn đến các vấn đề sức khỏe.

sentenceTransform.original: Poor diet causes obesity.
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại tập trung vào kết quả
sentenceTransform.answer: Obesity is caused by poor diet.
acceptedAnswers: Obesity is caused by poor diet.
Obesity is caused by poor diet
Obesity is caused by a poor diet.
Obesity is caused by a poor diet
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Béo phì là do chế độ ăn kém gây ra.

sentenceTransform.original: We recycle regularly. We can reduce waste.
sentenceTransform.answer: By recycling regularly, we can reduce waste.
acceptedAnswers: By recycling regularly, we can reduce waste.
By recycling regularly, we can reduce waste
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Bằng cách tái chế thường xuyên, chúng ta có thể giảm rác thải.

sentenceTransform.original: There is a lot of pollution. Many species are endangered.
sentenceTransform.answer: Due to pollution, many species are endangered.
acceptedAnswers: Due to pollution, many species are endangered.
Due to pollution, many species are endangered
Due to a lot of pollution, many species are endangered.
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Do ô nhiễm, nhiều loài đang bị đe dọa.

sentenceTransform.original: Exercise improves health.
sentenceTransform.instructionVi: Viết lại dùng V-ing làm chủ ngữ
sentenceTransform.answer: Exercising improves health.
acceptedAnswers: Exercising improves health.
Exercising improves health
Exercising regularly improves health.
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Tập thể dục cải thiện sức khỏe.

sentenceTransform.original: People suffer from stress. They work too much.
sentenceTransform.answer: People who work too much suffer from stress.
acceptedAnswers: People who work too much suffer from stress.
People who work too much suffer from stress
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Người làm việc quá nhiều bị căng thẳng.

sentenceTransform.original: We need better healthcare.
sentenceTransform.answer: What we need is better healthcare.
acceptedAnswers: What we need is better healthcare.
What we need is better healthcare
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Điều chúng ta cần là dịch vụ y tế tốt hơn.

sentenceTransform.original: Technology helps employees work from home.
sentenceTransform.answer: Technology enables employees to work from home.
acceptedAnswers: Technology enables employees to work from home.
Technology enables employees to work from home
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Công nghệ cho phép nhân viên làm việc tại nhà.

sentenceTransform.original: Good communication is important in the workplace.
sentenceTransform.hint: What is important in the workplace is...
sentenceTransform.answer: What is important in the workplace is good communication.
acceptedAnswers: What is important in the workplace is good communication.
What is important in the workplace is good communication
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Điều quan trọng ở nơi làm việc là giao tiếp tốt.

sentenceTransform.original: Employees work hard. They often get promoted.
sentenceTransform.answer: Employees who work hard often get promoted.
acceptedAnswers: Employees who work hard often get promoted.
Employees who work hard often get promoted
Employees who work hard are often promoted.
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Nhân viên làm việc chăm chỉ thường được thăng chức.

sentenceTransform.original: Students should practice. They will improve faster.
sentenceTransform.answer: If students practice, they will improve faster.
acceptedAnswers: If students practice, they will improve faster.
If students practice, they will improve faster
sentenceTransform.vietnamese: Nếu học sinh luyện tập, họ sẽ tiến bộ nhanh hơn.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Chính phủ đầu tư vào giáo dục giúp cải thiện chất lượng nguồn nhân lực.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Government investment in education improves workforce quality.

transformations.answer: The government invests in education to improve workforce quality.
acceptedAnswers: The government invests in education to improve workforce quality.
Government investment improves workforce quality.

transformations.answer: The government invests in education, which improves workforce quality.
acceptedAnswers: The government invests in education, which improves workforce quality.
The government invests in education, which helps improve workforce quality.

transformations.answer: Government investment in education leads to improved workforce quality.
acceptedAnswers: Government investment in education leads to improved workforce quality.
Investment in education leads to better workforce quality.
transformations.hint: Use 'leads to' to show cause and effect

transformations.answer: By investing in education, the government improves workforce quality.
acceptedAnswers: By investing in education, the government improves workforce quality.
By investing in education, the government can improve workforce quality.

transformations.answer: Government investment in education enables the workforce to improve.
acceptedAnswers: Government investment in education enables the workforce to improve.
Investment in education enables workers to develop better skills.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Công nghệ giúp mọi người làm việc từ xa hiệu quả hơn.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Technology helps people work remotely more effectively.

transformations.answer: Technology helps people work remotely more effectively.
acceptedAnswers: Technology helps people work remotely more effectively.
Technology helps people work from home more effectively.

transformations.answer: Technology allows people to work remotely more effectively.
acceptedAnswers: Technology allows people to work remotely more effectively.
Technology allows employees to work from home more effectively.

transformations.structureName: N + make it possible for + O + to V
transformations.formula: Subject + make it possible for + Object + to + Verb
transformations.answer: Technology makes it possible for people to work remotely more effectively.
acceptedAnswers: Technology makes it possible for people to work remotely more effectively.
Technology makes it possible for employees to work from home.

transformations.answer: Using technology helps people work remotely more effectively.
acceptedAnswers: Using technology helps people work remotely more effectively.
Using technology enables remote work to be more effective.

transformations.formula: There + is + Noun + that + relative clause
transformations.answer: There are technologies that help people work remotely more effectively.
acceptedAnswers: There are technologies that help people work remotely more effectively.
There are technologies that enable effective remote work.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Ô nhiễm không khí gây ra nhiều vấn đề sức khỏe cho người dân.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Air pollution causes many health problems for citizens.

transformations.answer: Air pollution causes many health problems for citizens.
acceptedAnswers: Air pollution causes many health problems for citizens.
Air pollution causes health problems for people.

transformations.answer: Air pollution leads to many health problems for citizens.
acceptedAnswers: Air pollution leads to many health problems for citizens.
Air pollution leads to various health issues.

transformations.answer: Many health problems are caused by air pollution.
acceptedAnswers: Many health problems are caused by air pollution.
Health problems in citizens are caused by air pollution.
transformations.hint: Focus on the effect, use passive 'is caused by'

transformations.answer: Due to air pollution, many citizens suffer from health problems.
acceptedAnswers: Due to air pollution, many citizens suffer from health problems.
Due to air pollution, people face many health issues.

transformations.answer: Air pollution results in many health problems for citizens.
acceptedAnswers: Air pollution results in many health problems for citizens.
Air pollution results in various health issues.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Tập thể dục thường xuyên giúp cải thiện sức khỏe thể chất và tinh thần.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Regular exercise helps improve physical and mental health.

transformations.answer: Exercising regularly helps improve physical and mental health.
acceptedAnswers: Exercising regularly helps improve physical and mental health.
Exercising regularly improves physical and mental health.

transformations.answer: Regular exercise leads to improved physical and mental health.
acceptedAnswers: Regular exercise leads to improved physical and mental health.
Regular exercise leads to better health.

transformations.answer: Physical and mental health can be improved by regular exercise.
acceptedAnswers: Physical and mental health can be improved by regular exercise.
Health can be improved through regular exercise.
transformations.hint: Use modal passive 'can be improved by...'

transformations.answer: By exercising regularly, people can improve their physical and mental health.
acceptedAnswers: By exercising regularly, people can improve their physical and mental health.
By exercising regularly, we can improve our health.

transformations.answer: What helps improve physical and mental health is regular exercise.
acceptedAnswers: What helps improve physical and mental health is regular exercise.
What improves both physical and mental health is regular exercise.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Nhân viên làm việc chăm chỉ thường được thăng chức.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Employees who work hard are often promoted.

transformations.formula: Noun + who + relative clause + main Verb
transformations.answer: Employees who work hard are often promoted.
acceptedAnswers: Employees who work hard are often promoted.
Workers who work hard are often promoted.

transformations.answer: Employees working hard are often promoted.
acceptedAnswers: Employees working hard are often promoted.
Hard-working employees are often promoted.
transformations.hint: Use reduced relative clause with V-ing

transformations.answer: If employees work hard, they are often promoted.
acceptedAnswers: If employees work hard, they are often promoted.
If employees work hard, they will often be promoted.

transformations.answer: Working hard often leads to promotion for employees.
acceptedAnswers: Working hard often leads to promotion for employees.
Working hard often results in promotion.

transformations.formula: The more + clause, the more + clause
transformations.answer: The harder employees work, the more likely they are to be promoted.
acceptedAnswers: The harder employees work, the more likely they are to be promoted.
The harder you work, the more likely you are to be promoted.

multiStructure.baseVietnamese: Học sinh cần thực hành nhiều hơn để thành công.
multiStructure.baseEnglish: Students need to practice more to succeed.

transformations.answer: Students need to practice more to succeed.
acceptedAnswers: Students need to practice more to succeed.
Students need more practice to succeed.
transformations.hint: Simple structure with infinitive of purpose

transformations.answer: What students need is more practice.
acceptedAnswers: What students need is more practice.
What students need to succeed is more practice.

transformations.answer: If students practice more, they will succeed.
acceptedAnswers: If students practice more, they will succeed.
If students practice more, they can succeed.

transformations.formula: The more + clause, the more + clause
transformations.answer: The more students practice, the more likely they are to succeed.
acceptedAnswers: The more students practice, the more likely they are to succeed.
The more students practice, the more successful they become.

transformations.answer: By practicing more, students can succeed.
acceptedAnswers: By practicing more, students can succeed.
By practicing more, students will succeed.
